description:
Lucci and Kaku from CP0, who came to Egghead with a mission to eliminate the seven Vegapunks, ask Luffy and Zoro to uncuff them so they can fight alongside them against the Seraphim, but Luffy and Zoro are reluctant to do so.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: A Tough Decision! An Unusual United Front!
Décision difficile. Une équipée bien baroque !
Eine bittere Entscheidung! – Eine einzigartige gemeinsame Front!
Kujuu no Ketsudan! Ishoku no Kyoutou Sensen!
قرار صعب! جبهة متحالفة غير اعتياديّة!
苦渋の決断! 異色の共闘戦線!
